source
main {
  lock = prim.newLock();
  block.acquireLock(lock);
  forkTo afterFork;
  t = <<25>>;
  block.sleep(t);
  releaseLock(lock);
  goto end;
}
afterFork {
  block.acquireLock(lock);
  x5 = 10;
}
end {}
----
application/datalog

slide
5
----
application/datalog

slide
40
----
application/datalog

reset
----
application/datalog

source
main {
  lock = prim.newLock();
  block.acquireLock(lock);
  forkTo afterFork;
  t = <<25>>;
  block.sleep(t);
  releaseLock(lock);
  goto end;
}
afterFork {
  block.acquireLock(lock);
  x5 = 10;
}
end {}
----
application/datalog

slide
20
----
application/datalog

slide

query
viz.continueMessage{}
----
application/datalog
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 10}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 9}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 11}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 10}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 12}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 11}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 13}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 12}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 14}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 13}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 15}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 14}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 16}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 15}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 17}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 16}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 18}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 17}}.

reset
----
application/datalog

source
main {
  lock = prim.newLock();
  block.acquireLock(lock);
  forkTo afterFork;
  t = <<25>>;
  block.sleep(t);
  releaseLock(lock);
  goto end;
}
afterFork {
  block.acquireLock(lock);
  x5 = 10;
}
end {}
----
application/datalog

slide
5
----
application/datalog

query
state.ProgramCounter{}
----
application/datalog
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 0, state: running{}, thread: 1, time: 1}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 1, state: running{}, thread: 1, time: 2}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 2, state: running{}, thread: 1, time: 3}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 3, state: running{}, thread: 1, time: 4}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 4, state: running{}, thread: 1, time: 5}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 5, state: blocked{reason: timer{start: 6, thread: 1}}, thread: 1, time: 10}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 5, state: blocked{reason: timer{start: 6, thread: 1}}, thread: 1, time: 6}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 5, state: blocked{reason: timer{start: 6, thread: 1}}, thread: 1, time: 7}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 5, state: blocked{reason: timer{start: 6, thread: 1}}, thread: 1, time: 8}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 5, state: blocked{reason: timer{start: 6, thread: 1}}, thread: 1, time: 9}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 5, state: running{}, thread: 1, time: 11}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 6, state: running{}, thread: 1, time: 12}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 7, state: blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, thread: 105, time: 10}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 7, state: blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, thread: 105, time: 11}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 7, state: blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, thread: 105, time: 12}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 7, state: blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, thread: 105, time: 13}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 7, state: blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, thread: 105, time: 5}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 7, state: blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, thread: 105, time: 6}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 7, state: blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, thread: 105, time: 7}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 7, state: blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, thread: 105, time: 8}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 7, state: blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, thread: 105, time: 9}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 7, state: running{}, thread: 105, time: 4}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 8, state: running{}, thread: 105, time: 12}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 9, state: running{}, thread: 1, time: 13}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 9, state: running{}, thread: 105, time: 13}.

debug.doubleProgramCounter{}

application/datalog
